title: ClaraIntro
body:
clara: Hi. I think I saw you the other day at the train station but I wasn't sure.

[[that wasn't me|notme]]
[[that was me|wasme]]

title: notme
body:
you: i don't think that was me. i wasn't there.

clara: Oh. Well they looked like you anyway. Are you looking for somewhere to put that bottle of wine? There's a table for drinks right there. What kind of wine is it?

[[red|redwine]]
[[white|whitewine]]
[[does it matter?|doesitmatter]]

title: redwine
body:
you: it's just red wine.

clara: Cool. Make sure you don't spill it lol. It'll stain. Paige will tell you where to put it.

title: whitewine
body:
you: it's just white wine

clara: Cool. My sister drinks white wine lol. I'll have some later. Paige will tell you where to put it anyway.

title: doesitmatter
body:
you: does it matter what kind of wine it is?

clara: Hm. I guess not. Just talk to Paige, she'll know where to put it.

title: wasme
body:
you: yeah, that might have been me.

clara: Certainly looked like you. Are you looking for somewhere to put that bottle of wine? There's a table for drinks right there. What kind of wine is it?

[[red|redwine]]
[[white|whitewine]]
[[does it matter?|doesitmatter]]
